Package org.jetel.util.string

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharSequenceCharacterIterator
    Bridge class between CharSequence and CharacterIterator interfaces.
    CharSequenceReader
    This class implements Reader interface on top of CharSequence - i.e.
    CloverString
    This class was derived from StringBuilder.
    CommentsProcessor
    This class implements simple algorithm, which removes all java-like comments from given string.
    Compare
    Miscelaneous comparison utilities
    Concatenate
    Class for concatenating string using a glue (separator) Can be used either as state machine or by calling a single method.
    LineReader
    Character reader which allows reading content line by line into specified buffer (any class implementing Appendable) - eg.
    MultiPattern  
    QuotingDecoder
    Class for conversion of string containing escape sequences and/or quotes to standard string where each char is represented by itself.
    QuotingDecoderMysql
    Quoting decoder for mysql client output
    StringAproxComparator
    Class for approximative string comparison
    StringAproxComparatorLocaleRules
    In this class are stored rules for StringAproxComparator for different locale Rules for given locale are stored in array of Strings: each String in the array have to be like "c1=c2=..
    StringUtils
    Helper class with some useful methods regarding string/text manipulation
    TagName
    Utility to generate valid XML tag name from arbitrary string.
    UnicodeBlanks
    Provides utility methods for working with Unicode blank (non-printable, whitespace) characters.
